library(PDS)
library(dplyr)
AH <- tbl_df(AddHealth)  %>%
  mutate(HeightIn = H1GH59A*12 + H1GH59B)
summary(AH)

AddHealth$H1GH59A[AddHealth$H1GH59A == 96 | AddHealth$H1GH59A == 98] <- NA
AddHealth$H1GH59A[AddHealth$H1GH59B == 98 | AddHealth$H1GH59B == 99] <- NA

AH <- select(AddHealth, H1GH59A, H1GH59B)
head(AH)
AH <- mutate(AH, Height = H1GH59A*12 + H1GH59B)
head(AH)
summary(AH$Height)
